text:
imagine posting travel photos on one platform, food photos on another! 
this is what happens to our lists divided across spotify, goodreads, letterboxd, etc. curations is your one identity for all your consumption.
how is this @_buildspace community?   @_nightsweekends @FarzaTV https://t.co/mDzkO5z2wb
